content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
So, just to clarify, you are currently at an academic burnout, and there' s been a huge amount of research on how to deal with it?
Yes, that's true. I am confused about what research can I do.

I understand, there are a lot of different types of research out there. One thing that has helped me in the past is having a podcast where I listen to some really helpful music and discuss what I' ve been struggling with. Have you considered doing podcasts?
